entities.name: quirrell
entities.description: Quirrell is mentioned as someone who was with Harry, but did not take on Riddle and the basilisk.

entities.name: riddle
entities.description: Riddle is mentioned as someone Quirrell did not take on.

entities.name: basilisk
entities.description: The basilisk is mentioned as something that Quirrell and others did not take on.

entities.name: sirius
entities.description: Sirius is mentioned as someone who escaped.

entities.name: dumbledore
entities.description: Dumbledore is mentioned as the one who chooses prefects.

entities.name: ron
entities.description: Ron is mentioned as someone who may have something that Harry does not.

entities.name: fred
entities.description: Fred is mentioned as the one who said no one in their right mind would make Ron a prefect.

relationships.description: Dumbledore chooses prefects, and it is implied that he chose Ron for reasons other than getting into dangerous situations.
Fred said no one in their right mind would make Ron a prefect.
